New Records: Equatorial Guinea are unbeaten in their last three group stage games at AFCON and aim to make it four in a row.
Guinea-Bissau have not scored in their last eight AFCON games since 2017.
Key Match Events: Equatorial Guinea took the lead against Nigeria in their opening game but ended in a draw.
Guinea-Bissau struggled to score, limiting a strong opponent to low expected goals.
Pre-Game Insights: The Opta supercomputer predicts Equatorial Guinea as the likely winner with a 39.4% chance, while Guinea-Bissau has a 33.8% chance and a draw is possible.
Equatorial Guinea has a strong recent form with key players contributing to their success.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Guinea-Bissau have had 88 shots and 797 minutes without scoring at AFCON since 2017, a significant record.
